text: And they came up into Judah, and brake into it, and carried away all the substance that was found in the king’s house, and his sons also, and his wives; so that there was never a son left him, save Jehoahaz, the youngest of his sons.21.17 carried…: Heb. carried captive21.17 Jehoahaz: also called, Ahaziah, or, Azariah
